transcript:
meiringen ctr and tma are not active
expect ctr and tma meiringen to be active again tomorrow from 7 30 local time
if you hear this message after 7 30 local time, contact ...

meiringen ctr and tma are not active
expect ctr and tma meiringen to be active again next monday from 7 30 local time
if you hear this message on monday after 7 30 local time, contact ...

this message is updated at 7 30, 13 15 and 17 05 local time
todays flight operating hours are from 7 30 till 12 15 local time and from 13 00 to 17 15 local time
meiringen ctr and ALL tma sectors are active

this message is updated at 7 30, 13 15 and 17 05 local time
todays flight operating hours are from 7 30 til 18 15 local time
during the flight operation hours, meiringen ctr and tma sectors 1, 2 and 3 can be activated any time
tma sectors 4, 5 and 6 remain deactivated until the next update
meiringen CTR and TMA are currently not active

this message is updated at 7 30, 13 15 and 17 05 local time
todays flight operating hours are from 7 30 til 18 15 local time
meiringen ctr and tma 1, 2 and 3 are active
tma sectors 4, 5 and 6 remain deactivated until the next update
